info.name: Traveler Custom Background
info.description: Custom Traveler Background made from AideDD

element.name: Champion

description.p: You have travelled the world, seeing its wonders and horrors with your own eyes. However you have travelled, you have lived in many lands, in the most diverse climates and under the most varied conditions. You have crossed paths with many people during your travels and are familiar with many cultures. As part of a merchant caravan, alone or in a small group, you've been to places that ordinary people don't even know exist. The big cities and their crowds don't frighten you any more than the deserted expanses, because you know how to get by in any environment.

ul.li: Equipment: A walking staff, a souvenir from a faraway land (choose or draw from the trinket table), a book filled with notes on your travels or drawings, a bottle of ink and a quill, some travel clothes and a purse containing 10po.

I always have a travel anecdote to tell about any situation.
I've seen so much that nothing really surprises me anymore.
I'm always prepared to give a creature the benefit of the doubt and never trust my own prejudices.
I can't stand still and get bored if I spend more than a few days in one place.
I'm convinced I'm jinxing the people around me, so I never stay anywhere for long.
I like to travel alone, and even when I'm in a group I sometimes go off on my own.
I'm fascinated by anything exotic, be it objects, creatures or people.
I am condescending to peasants who have never been out of their village.
The world is full of wonders and I want to see them all (Good).
Why stay in one place all your life when you can hit the road (Chaotic).
It's my duty to understand other people and meet them (Lawful).
Every people has different ways of causing pain, one day I'll know them all (Evil).
The world is a vast place, perhaps I haven't seen everything yet (Any).
The road is my only true friend (Neutral).
I've heard about a place I absolutely want to go.
In the course of my travels, I've fallen madly in love with someone, and one day I'll come back to win their heart.
My journey is an initiatory task dictated to me by my community. When I have reached the end of the journey, I will return home.
I have a pet, a faithful travelling companion that I wouldn't give up for anything in the world.
I've fled the place where I grew up and I don't dare go back.
Every step I take takes me further away from a destiny that was foretold to me.
Travelling is all that matters to me, I'll never settle anywhere.
I don't rest until I've walked for at least an hour, even if that means pacing.
I always end up mixing different peoples' customs and making mistakes.
I've made a powerful enemy in a faraway land and I hope he never finds out where I am.
I remain very naive and believe that there is good in absolutely everyone.
I'm not travelling for pleasure, I'm running away from something terrible that is relentlessly pursuing me.

description.p: Your travels have taught you to quickly adopt the customs of the people you meet, their accents, the way they dress, the way they behave, even the way they walk. When you arrive in a town or region, it doesn't take long to pass yourself off as a local. What's more, if you wish, you can behave as if you were a native of every place you pass through. At the start of the game, work out with your MD how many origins you can imitate. You also know a few words of many languages, enough to get by in basic social interaction (saying hello, thank you, ordering a drink, for example) with almost any civilised humanoid (here again, the GM is the only judge).
